mapper.select: SELECT SECTION_ID, NAME, INLINE_FLG, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM V_SECTION WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND SECTION_ID = #{section_id};
SELECT SECTION_ID, NAME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM SECTION WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND SECTION_ID <> 0 ORDER BY SECTION_ID;
SELECT SECTION_ID, NAME, UPDATED_BY, UPDATED_TIME FROM SECTION WHERE DELETE_FLG = 0 AND INLINE_FLG = 1 ORDER BY SECTION_ID;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SECTION (NAME, UPDATED_BY, INLINE_FLG, UPDATED_TIME) VALUES (#{name}, #{updated_by}, #{inline_flg}, current_timestamp);
mapper.update: UPDATE SECTION SET NAME = #{name}, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, INLINE_FLG = #{inline_flg}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE SECTION_ID = #{section_id};
UPDATE SECTION SET DELETE_FLG = 1, UPDATED_BY = #{updated_by}, UPDATED_TIME = current_timestamp WHERE SECTION_ID = #{section_id};
mapper.select: SELECT distinct sec.* FROM section sec JOIN position_of_section pos on sec.section_id = pos.section_id WHERE sec.delete_flg = 0 AND (pos.position_id IN (SELECT position_id FROM operator_abilities oa WHERE oa.operator_id = #{operator_id} ) OR pos.position_id IN (SELECT position_id FROM operator op WHERE op.operator_id = #{operator_id} ))
